results.title: Oral simvastatin treatment in relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Treatment was well tolerated. Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might inhibit @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ components of @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@ that lead to @<m>DISEASE_Movement_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009069 @@@neurological disability@@@.

results.title: Applying causal models to explore the mechanism of action of simvastatin in progressive multiple sclerosis
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: The challenge of understanding the mode of action of a medication is exemplified by the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ trial, a phase 2 trial for secondary progressive @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS@@@, in which MRI measures of @DISEASE_Atrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Movement_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009069 @@@clinical disability@@@ showed beneficial effects.

Applying causal models to explore the mechanism of action of simvastatin in progressive multiple sclerosis Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2019 May 28;116(22):11020-11027. PMID: 31072935
